page.title: 14 Environmental Problems
page.content: Many trees have been planted in the Glascote area to replace those damaged by vandals. Vandalism has become a problem to our nature. Many saplings have been destroyed on purpose. Recently Linear Park lake was drained and dredged. Many surprising items were found, even a moped! Our beautiful lake continues to be used as a rubbish tip. The swans and our lake are at risk! The local canals are in a similar state. Very little water life can be found in the dirty water. A road has been proposed through our local park which is causing much concern for many people. A lot of the nature will be destroyed and although it may ease traffic, it will spoil our surroundings.
